name: Brenda
placeOfBirth: Port Gerald, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
description: Brenda is a hazel-eyed llama with white hair, standing 198 cm tall. Originally from Port Gerald, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands, Brenda enjoys wood carving, hiking, cooking. Known for their mischievous and mischievous personality, Brenda is a beloved member of the llama community.
